Title: The Wickless Candle
Description:
Now tell story of very far place called "surface". New friend from there, yes, so they know what Granny Scribbles talk about.

<Granny Scribbles nods sagely as she points you out.>

Story of how kobold discover it long go, and what find when do. Story of the wickless candle...
RewardText:
You not bad listener, $n. Name you honorary tenderfoot, Granny Scribbles thinks.

Maybe next time you tell Granny Scribbles story. Never too old to learn new one.

Objectives.Text: Ask Granny Scribbles about the Wickless Candle
